explains: vt. 重新装配；重新召集

sentences.en: We will now try to reassemble pieces of the wreckage.
sentences.cn: 我们现在会尽量把残骸重新组合起来。

sentences.en: We'll reassemble in the parking lot in thirty minutes.
sentences.cn: 30分钟后，我们将在停车场再一次集合。

sentences.en: We had to take the table apart and reassemble it upstairs.
sentences.cn: 我们只好先把桌子拆开，到楼上再组装起来。
